title: OnYourFit
about: This application is designed to assist hikers find the best trail in a city based on 3 parameters(difficulty grade, conditional status and/or location)set by the end user.

title: Weather_App
about: A simple weather app tha uses a third-party API to display the weather today and the next five days on the City of your choice arround the world. Your most recent searches are seaved.

title: Coding Quiz
about: One of the first applications. Is a series of questions dinamically generated and score keeping records on local storage.

title: Avail
about: Avail is a peer to peer tutoring resource that brings students of all subjects together to learn and grow.

title: My Google Books
about: React-based Google Books Search app. This application uses React components, works with helper/util functions, and utilizes React lifecycle methods to query and display books based on user searches.It also uses Node, Express and MongoDB so that users can save books to review or purchase later.
